entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023
